Wellcome toFight Club!

Here you can make a wished rate for win. Player who confirmed your rate automatically confirmed your request. If you win you will earn double rate. Also you can check the players who already made their rates and waiting for battle. You need just open the menu item. Just click on player nickname and batlle will start. But if you have not enough items in inventory or player will cancelled the request batlle will not start.
Good luck! And remeber - winner will earn all!
